QuestData.Title: The Final Effigy
QuestData.Description:
<The effigy's protection has been broken.
All that remains is to break the effigy itself.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Cursed Effigy in Fallhaven.
QuestData.RewardText: What's... going on? How long have I been standing here?$B$BA curse!? You're saying the whole village was just... stuck? I knew there was something terribly wrong with that old crone...$B$BIt seems that Fallhaven owes you a great debt, stranger.
